12小时无攻略单人通关应该算正常水平吧，但仍然让我觉得十分的肝。章节之间的承接十分顺畅，柳暗花明的设计第一次让我玩解谜游戏玩得停不下来，类似的快感Gorogoa虽然也有但由于太短了不过瘾。
真没想到portal的游戏篇幅能那么长，制作还那么好。
就突然萌起这种赛博风的电音了哎！glados赛高！
This is an amazing game with great re-playability. It even has a crate-your-own-chamber section, which keeps the fun alive. Absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a fun puzzle game.
One of my all time favourites! Story great. Gameplay great. Editor for selfmade levels. 10 / 10
个人是非常喜欢fps游戏的，这也是我第一款玩的解谜类型的fps游戏，但是和以往的fps游戏不同，这款游戏不属于射击击杀的fps，而是用发射传送门的枪来制造传送门和变化莫测地图来解谜闯关（个人不建议有3D晕玩家尝试），而且游戏的剧情相当不错，闯关的同时也加带着剧情的进展（地图的隐藏或者特殊地段会触发游戏彩蛋）看得出V社还是非常用心的，很赞的经典游戏！

I love this game. I remember I saw an ad for the 1st one and was curious. Then for Christmas I got a copy of portal for my computer and loved it. When I heard there was a sequel I was thrilled. I was blown away by the graphics. The game was almost overwhelming to my 9 year old mind. Seeing all the levels that people created was amazing to me. I would recommend this game to anyone.

Half life 3 confirmed

Did you like Portal? Buy Portal 2. An actual 10-hour single-player mode, a co-op mode, and a level creator. It's like the ultimate form of Portal. You'll never run out of levels.

Have you never played Portal but you like puzzle games? Go download the Portal demo. Give it a whirl! If you like it, you'll probably like Portal and Portal 2. If you don't, then don't get these games.

If you don't have Portal or Portal 2 and you want to try them out, buy the bundle and save 5 dollars. Play Portal, and immediately after play Portal 2. The experience is much better that way. 

This game is funny and a bit of a head-scratcher depending on the type of person you are. If you find the tests are too easy, try out some community levels and level-packs (I recommend 12 Angry Tests and Portal Stories: Mel) or play the co-op campaign with a mate. Definitely one of my favorite games of all time.

Purely AWESOME. A very good instalment to the previous game, and a fantastic raise in graphics quality. In this the gameplay is about the same as in the last game, very good, and the story is amazing, lasting twice as long as Portal, Portal 2 has you go into another area of the facilities where you must figure out what to do all by yourself with no goal other than to get to the next place. High framerate on midranged PC with very few dips in framerate, mostly when looking at an open area.

This game is excelent! It's a very original and inovative puzzle game!!!
The level design is very well done. There are many different mechanics which make every level feel unique and fresh.
The scenarios in which the game takes place have meaningful details that realy help telling the story.
The characters and the story are extremely interesting!

Portal 2 is one of my favorite single player experiences and it is a must play for sure! Everything from music to gameplay is amazing. The game is designed so everyone can enjoy it, whether you are young or old, the humor and the puzzles are fit for anyone. If you played the original Portal you will be familiar with the puzzles, but the atmosphere of this game is a bit different. In my opinion the first game has a much creepier atmosphere that this one. Despite that, both games are really good and you should check them out if you haven't!

Portal 2, je to hra, ktorá následuje po úspešnej prvej hre Portal, musím povedať, že naozaj je to zaujímavé pokračovanie, samozrejme, najviac ma zaujal kóperácia (Multiplayer), lebo v Jednotke sa nenachádzal, tak to by som povedal, že je také iné a viac zábavné, zároveň to vie potrápiť aj mozog! Je to skorej hra, zameraná pre hráčov, ktorý radšej rozmýšľajú, či riešia nejaké 'Puzzle' hry.

Mne sa hra osobne páčila o dosť ako Prvá verzia hry 'Portal', za mňa určite odporúčam aspoň vyskúšať.

La verdad entre Portal y Portal 2 hay muchas diferencias, no solo es la continuación, sino que también añaden un diseñador de pruebas, nuevas mecánicas en los puzzles, más profundidad en la historia, modo cooperativo, etc.
Es preferible comprar este juego, ya que además esta a buen precio y sería mejor gastar en un juego más completo, que en el anterior juego, ya que el precio es casi el mismo.
Yo lo compre en oferta, a unos diminutos 7 soles (divisa peruana) y la verdad esa clase de ofertas no te las puedes perder.
Muy recomendable si te gustan los puzzles, ya que no se limitan a los creados por valve, sino que también puedes buscar algunos en la comunidad.
